titleStmt.title: A voice in Rhama: or, The crie of women and children. Ecchoed forth in the compassions of Peter Chamberlen, Doctour in Physick, Fellow of the Colledge of London, and one of his Majesties physicians extraordinary.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Bentley: for John Marshall, and are to be sold at his shop at the Hand and Pen in Corn-hill, over against the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 1st 1646"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Corn-hill, over against the Royall Exchange
